段: 離別的時陣毋願來流出著傷心珠淚滴，因為我無希望加添著伊離別心傷悲，想欲忍著珠淚，獻笑容對待伊，猶原也珠淚滴露出目墘。

li7-piat8 e5 si5-chun7 m7 goan7 lai5 lau5 chhut tioh8 siong-sim chu-lui7 tih, in-ui7 goa2 bo5 hi-bang7 ke-thinn tioh8 i li7-piat8 sim siong-pi, siunn7 beh lun2 tioh8 chu-lui7, hian3 chhio3-iong5 tui3-thai7 i, iu5-goan5 ia7 chu-lui7 tih lou7-chhut bak8-kinn5.
知影有今日的分離，心情上應該早就準備，因為阮毋願看伊為阮來心傷悲，失去了伊的決心伊的勇氣，雖然你聲聲安慰著阮，叫阮等伊轉來，阮也有相信伊對阮抱著堅定好情意，所以忍著珠淚，獻笑容對待伊，猶原也珠淚滴露出目墘。

chai-iann2 u7 kim-jit8 e5 hun-li7, sim-cheng5 siong7 eng-kai cha2 chiu7 chun2-pi7, in-ui7 goan2 m7 goan7 khoann3 i ui7 goan2 lai5 sim siong-pi, sit-khi3 liau2 i e5 koat-sim i e5 iong2-khi3, sui-jian5 li2 siann-siann an-ui3 tioh8 goan2, kio3 goan2 tan2 i tng2--lai5, goan2 ia7 u7 siong-sin3 i tui3 gun2 phau7 tioh8 kian-teng7 ho2 cheng5-i3, sou2-i2 lun2 tioh8 chu-lui7, hian3 chhio3-iong5 tui3-thai7 i, iu5-goan5 ia7 chu-lui7 tih lou7-chhut bak8-kinn5.
離別的時陣毋願來流出著傷心珠淚滴，因為我無希望加添著伊離別心傷悲，想欲忍著珠淚，獻笑容對待伊，猶原也珠淚滴露出目墘。

li7-piat8 e5 si5-chun7 m7 goan7 lai5 lau5 chhut tioh8 siong-sim chu-lui7 tih, in-ui7 goa2 bo5 hi-bang7 ke-thinn tioh8 i li7-piat8 sim siong-pi, siunn7 beh lun2 tioh8 chu-lui7, hian3 chhio3-iong5 tui3-thai7 i, iu5-goan5 ia7 chu-lui7 tih lou7-chhut bak8-kinn5.
知影有今日的分離，心情上應該早就準備，因為阮毋願看伊為阮來心傷悲，失去了伊的決心伊的勇氣，雖然你聲聲安慰著阮，叫阮等伊轉來，阮也有相信伊對阮抱著堅定好情意，所以忍著珠淚，獻笑容對待伊，猶原也珠淚滴露出目墘。

chai-iann2 u7 kim-jit8 e5 hun-li7, sim-cheng5 siong7 eng-kai cha2 chiu7 chun2-pi7, in-ui7 goan2 m7 goan7 khoann3 i ui7 goan2 lai5 sim siong-pi, sit-khi3 liau2 i e5 koat-sim i e5 iong2-khi3, sui-jian5 li2 siann-siann an-ui3 tioh8 goan2, kio3 goan2 tan2 i tng2--lai5, goan2 ia7 u7 siong-sin3 i tui3 gun2 phau7 tioh8 kian-teng7 ho2 cheng5-i3, sou2-i2 lun2 tioh8 chu-lui7, hian3 chhio3-iong5 tui3-thai7 i, iu5-goan5 ia7 chu-lui7 tih lou7-chhut bak8-kinn5.
有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？歹銅仔舊錫簿仔紙通賣無？
u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? phainn2-tang5-a2 ku7-siah phou7-a2-choa2 thang boe7 bo5?
透早著出門，拚到日頭欲黃昏，為著顧三頓，街頭巷尾四界鑽，有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？艱苦我毋驚，風雨我照行，這是阮運命，啊！趁著少年認真拚，將來將來將來才有好名聲。

thau3-cha2 tioh8 chhut-mng5, piann3 kau3 jit8-thau5 beh hong5-hun, ui7 tioh8 kou3 sann-tng3, ke-thau5 hang7-boe2 si3-koe3 chng3, u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? kan-khou2 goa2 m7 kiann, hong-hou7 goa2 chiau3 kiann5, che si7 goan2 un7-mia7, ah! than3 tioh8 siau3-lian5 jin7-chin piann3, chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiah u7 ho2 mia5-siann.
做人愛認份，好歹總是無十全，路行欲久長，眼光著愛看予遠，有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？艱苦我毋驚，風雨我照行，這是阮運命，啊！趁著少年認真拚，將來將來將來才有好名聲。

cho3 lang5 ai3 jin7-hun7, ho2-phainn2 chong2-si7 bo5 chap8-chng5, lou7 kiann5 beh ku2-tng5, gan2-kong tioh8 ai3 khoann3 hou7 hng7, u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? kan-khou2 goa2 m7 kiann, hong-hou7 goa2 chiau3-kiann5, che si7 goan2 un7-mia7, ah! than3 tioh8 siau3-lian5 jin7-chin piann3, chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiah u7 ho2 mia5-siann.
有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？艱苦我毋驚，風雨我照行，這是阮運命，啊！趁著少年認真拚，將來將來將來才有好名聲。

u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? kan-khou2 goa2 m7 kiann, hong-hou7 goa2 chiau3-kiann5, che si7 goan2 un7-mia7, ah! than3 tioh8 siau3-lian5 jin7-chin piann3, chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiong-lai5 chiah u7 ho2 mia5-siann.
有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？歹銅仔舊錫簿仔紙通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？有酒矸通賣無？歹銅仔舊錫簿仔紙通賣無？

u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? phainn2-tang5-a2 ku7-siah phou7-a2-choa2 thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? u7 chiu2-kan thang boe7 bo5? phainn2-tang5-a2 ku7-siah phou7-a2-choa2 thang boe7 bo5?
有話坦白講出來，無論啥人會瞭解，若有心事免悲哀，做人總是愛忍耐，成功抑失敗由天來安排，何必鬱悴在心內？我嘛為著你關懷，啊！不言不語上屆害，應該盡心講出來，無講啥人知？

u7 oe7 than2-pek8 kong2--chhut-lai5, bo5-lun7 siann2-lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, na7 u7 sim-su7 bian2 pi-ai, cho3-lang5 chong2-si7 ai3 jim2-nai7, seng5-kong a2 sit-pai7 iu5 thinn lai5 an-pai5, ho5-pit ut-chut chai7 sim-lai7? goa2 ma7 ui7 tioh8 li2 koan-hoai5, ah! put-gian5 put-gi2 siong7-kai3 hai7, eng-kai chin7-sim kong2--chhut-lai5, bo5 kong2 siann2-lang5 chai?
有話坦白講出來，無論啥人會瞭解，若有心事免悲哀，做人總是愛忍耐，成功抑失敗由天來安排，何必鬱悴在心內？我嘛為著你關懷，啊！不言不語上屆害，應該盡心講出來，無講啥人知？

u7 oe7 than2-pek8 kong2--chhut-lai5, bo5-lun7 siann2-lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, na7 u7 sim-su7 bian2 pi-ai, cho3-lang5 chong2-si7 ai3 jim2-nai7, seng5-kong a2 sit-pai7 iu5 thinn lai5 an-pai5, ho5-pit ut-chut chai7 sim-lai7? goa2 ma7 ui7 tioh8 li2 koan-hoai5, ah! put-gian5 put-gi2 siong7-kai3 hai7, eng-kai chin7-sim kong2--chhut-lai5, bo5 kong2 siann2-lang5 chai?
成功抑失敗由天來安排，何必鬱悴在心內？我嘛為著你關懷，啊！不言不語上屆害，應該盡心講出來，無講啥人知？

seng5-kong a2 sit-pai7 iu5 thinn lai5 an-pai5, ho5-pit ut-chut chai7 sim-lai7? goa2 ma7 ui7 tioh8 li2 koan-hoai5, ah! put-gian5 put-gi2 siong7-kai3 hai7, eng-kai chin7-sim kong2--chhut-lai5, bo5 kong2 siann2-lang5 chai?
一條路，尋無咱的腳步，一段情，惦惦交予運命，一个夢，想甲目箍紅，這陣阮一人愛甲毋知輕重，有情人上毋甘，聽著傷心歌，思念無所在通放，愈聽愈孤單。

chit8 tiau5 lou7, chhoe7 bo5 lan2 e5 kha-pou7, chit8 toann7 cheng5, tiam7-tiam7 kau hou7 un7-mia7, chit8 e5 bang7, siunn7 kah bak8-khou ang5, chit chun7 gun2 chit8 lang5 ai3 kah m7 chai khin-tang7, u7 cheng5 lang5 siong7 m7 kam, thiann tioh8 siong-sim-koa, su-liam7 bo5 sou2-chai7 thang pang3, lu2 thiann lu2 kou-toann.
有情人，夜夜夢，夜夜希望，惦惦為你空等，春天即爾慢，毋捌感覺即孤單，愛攏相仝，毋通勸阮將你放，我會毋甘，若是註定一世人，無你來做伴，我心甘情願，愛到無半項。

u7 cheng5 lang5, ia7-ia7 bang7, ia7-ia7 hi-bong7, tiam7-tiam7 ui7 li2 khang tan2, chhun-thinn chiah-nih ban7, m7 pat kam2-kak chiah kou-toann, ai3 long2 sio-kang5, m7 thang khng3 goan2 chiong li2 pang3, goa2 e7 m7 kam, na7 si7 chu3-tiann7 chit8-si3-lang5, bo5 li2 lai5 cho3-phoann7, goa2 sim-kam-cheng5-goan7, ai3 kau3 bo5 poann3 hang7.
多情的人是久久長長，心無變，無心的人是講話三心兩意，傷心看透透，將往事放水流，管伊管伊感情薄抑厚，無情的人是假假真真，分未清，有心的人是心悶輕聲吐哮，相逢到分開，像露水鴛鴦，毋知心靈上深的溫柔。

to-cheng5 e5 lang5 si7 ku2-ku2-tng5-tng5, sim bo5 pian3, bo5 sim e5 lang5 si7 kong2-oe7 sam-sim-liong2-i3, siong-sim khoann3-thau3-thau3, chiong ong2-su7 pang3-chui2-lau5, koan2 i koan2 i kam2-cheng5 poh8 iah8 kau7, bo5 cheng5 e5 lang5 si7 ke2-ke2 chin-chin, hun be7 chheng, u7 sim e5 lang5 si7 sim-bun7 khin-siann thou2 hau2, siong-hong5 kau3 hun-khui, chhiunn7 lou7-chui2-oan-iunn, m7 chai sim-leng5 siong7 chhim e5 un-jiu5.
用一生所有的真情換來種種痛苦的如今，當做是一場錯誤的過去，為感情唱出的悲歌，只有寂寞陪伴著孤單，總講一句為啥物你有情無心肝？

eng7 it-seng sou2-u7 e5 chin-cheng5 oann7 lai5 chiong2-chiong2 thong3-khou2 e5 ju5-kim, tong3-cho3 si7 chit8 tiunn5 chho3-gou7 e5 koe3-khi3, ui7 kam2-cheng5 chhiunn3 chhut e5 pi-koa, chi2-u7 chek8-bok8 poe5-phoann7 tioh8 kou-toann, chong2-kong2 chit8 ku3 ui7 siann2-mih8 li2 u7 cheng5 bo5 sim-koann?
離開故鄉幾落冬，現在到底變做啥物款？阿爸幾歲，阿母幾歲，恁的身邊有啥人陪？
li7-khui kou3-hiong kui2-loh8 tang, hian7-chai7 tau3-te2 pinn3-cho3 siann2-mih8 khoan2? a-pa kui2 hoe3, a-bu2 kui2 hoe3, lin2 e5 sin-pinn u7 siann2-lang5 poe5?
離開愛人幾偌冬，賭一口氣面對每一暗，寂寞歹過，嘿無啥貨，阮愛你在底，無論拄著啥物阻礙，你永遠攏是阮的將來。

li7-khui ai3-jin5 kui2-loa7 tang, tou2 chit8 khau2 khi3 bin7-tui3 mui2 chit8 am3, chek8-bok8 phainn2-koe3, he bo5 siann2-hoe3, goan2 ai3 li2 chai7 toe2, bo5-lun7 tu2 tioh8 siann2-mih8 chou2-gai7, li2 eng2-oan2 long2 si7 goan2 e5 chiong-lai5.
毋通準是阮無關懷，愛你永遠藏佇阮心內，有閒寫信，無閒拍電話。
m7 thang chun2 si7 goan2 bo5 koan-hoai5, ai3 li2 eng2-oan2 chhang3 ti7 gun2 sim-lai7, u7 eng5 sia2 sin3, bo5 eng5 phah tian7-oe7.
期待趕緊轉去佮你相會，將阮心內的話講甲天色白，阮只要整天佮你坐做伙，有閒種花，欣賞著美麗，將思念的情用心栽培咱的心願，免山盟佮海誓，你就是我的希望我的一切。

ki5-thai7 koann2-kin2 tng2 khi3 kah li2 siong-hoe7, chiong gun2 sim-lai7 e5 oe7 kong2 kah thinn-sek peh8, goan2 chi2-iau3 cheng2-thian kah li2 che7 cho3-hoe2, u7 eng5 cheng3 hoe, him-siong2 tioh8 bi2-le7, chiong su-liam7 e5 cheng5 iong7-sim chai-poe5 lan2 e5 sim-goan7, bian2 soann-beng5 kah hai2-se3, li2 chiu7-si7 goa2 e5 hi-bong7 goa2 e5 it-chhe3.
時間親像牛底散步，到底佟時天會烏，等未下班無心無情，招伊欲七桃，看著伊底過大路，三步做兩步，心內又閣愛笑啊！又閣驚伊對阮心事完全捎攏無，交代伊有話你就講啦。

si5-kan chhin-chhiunn7 gu5 teh san3-pou7, tau3-te2 tong5 si5 thinn e7 ou, tan2 be7 ha7-pan bo5-sim bo5-cheng5, chio i beh thit-tho5, khoann3 tioh8 i teh koe3 toa7 lou7, sann pou7 choe3 nng7 pou7, sim-lai7 iu7 koh ai3-chhio3 ah! iu7 koh kiann i tui3 gun2 sim-su7 oan5-choan5 sa long2 bo5, kau-tai7 i u7 oe7 li2 chiu7 kong2--lah.
明知有心愛我，那會即驚歹勢啦，無閒工來寫批，嘛有我的電話，上班時間盡量撽，實在是有話你就講啦。現代人的生活，緊張刺激平常啦，若是真心對我，毋免真濟咒誓，我嘛歡喜跟你行。

beng5-chai u7 sim ai3 goa2, na2 e7 chiah kiann phainn2-se3 lah, bo5 eng5-kang lai5 sia2-phoe, ma7 u7 goa2 e5 tian7-oe7, siong7-pan si5-kan chin7-liong7 kha3, sit8-chai7 si7 u7 oe7 li2 chiu7 kong2--lah. hian7-tai7-lang5 e5 seng-oah8, kin2-tiunn chhi3-kek peng5-siong5-lah, na7 si7 chin-sim tui3 goa2, m7 bian2 chin che7 chiu3-choa7, goa2 ma7 hoann-hi2 toe3 li2 kiann5.
有影無影，阮自己知影，虛情假意，隨在你搬，外口的風風雨雨，莫吹來茲，無看著影，無聽著聲，咱的緣份，就行到茲（就到茲煞）。

u7-iann2 bo5-iann2, goan2 chu7-ki2 chai-iann2, hi-cheng5-ke2-i3, sui5-chai7 li2 poann, goa7-khau2 e5 hong-hong-u2-u2, mai3 chhe lai5 chia, bo5 khoann3 tioh8 iann2, bo5 thiann tioh8 siann, lan2 e5 ian5-hun7, chiu7 kiann5 kau3 chia (chiu7 kau3 chia soah) .
明知影你有喙無心，嘛無稀罕阮的心肝，男子漢的目屎，敢會當隨便予你看？明知影你有喙無心，失去了你，欲按怎活？男子漢的痛苦，攏嘛是吞忍佇心肝。

beng5 chai-iann2 li2 u7 chhui3 bo5 sim, ma7 bo5 hi-han2 goan2 e5 sim-koann, lam5-chu2-han3 e5 bak8-sai2, kam2 e7 tang3 sui5-pian7 hou7 li2 khoann3? beng5 chai-iann2 li2 u7 chhui3 bo5 sim, sit-khi3 liau2 li2, beh an2-choann2 oah8? lam5-chu2-han3 e5 thong3-khou2, long2 ma7 si7 thun-lun2 ti7 sim-koann.
有人講看著你彼日散步淡水河，身邊的彼个人是一个大帥哥，一時雄雄忽然間我毋知欲如何，想欲問你有影無？你講無這回事，是我底烏白想，你講伊只是一个普通的朋友，這个理由即勉強，我也猶原激戇戇，你若欲佮我扯，我袂閣再囉唆，有影無有影無？

u7 lang5 kong2 khoann3 tioh8 li2 hit jit8 san3-pou7 Tam7-chui2-ho5, sin-pinn e5 hit e5 lang5 si7 chit8 e5 toa7 soe3-ko, chit8-si5 hiong5-hiong5 hut-jian5 kan goa2 m7 chai beh ju5-ho5, siunn7 beh mng7 li2 u7 iann2 bo5? li2 kong2 bo5 chit hoe5 su7, si7 goa2 teh ou-peh8 siunn7, li2 kong2 i chi2-si7 chit8 e5 phou2-thong e5 peng5-iu2, che e5 li2-iu5 chiah bian2-kiong2, goa2 ia7 iu5-goan5 kek-gong7-gong7, li2 na7 beh kah goa2 chhe2, goa2 boe7 koh chai3 lo-so, u7 iann2 bo5 u7 iann2 bo5?
有人講看著你彼日散步淡水河，身邊的彼个人是一个大帥哥，一時雄雄忽然間我毋知欲如何，想欲問你有影無？你講無這回事，是我底烏白想，你講伊只是一个普通的朋友，這个理由即勉強，我也猶原激戇戇，你若欲佮我扯，我袂閣再囉唆，有影無有影無？

u7 lang5 kong2 khoann3 tioh8 li2 hit jit8 san3-pou7 Tam7-chui2-ho5, sin-pinn e5 hit e5 lang5 si7 chit8 e5 toa7 soe3-ko, chit8-si5 hiong5-hiong5 hut-jian5 kan goa2 m7 chai beh ju5-ho5, siunn7 beh mng7 li2 u7 iann2 bo5? li2 kong2 bo5 chit hoe5 su7, si7 goa2 teh ou-peh8 siunn7, li2 kong2 i chi2-si7 chit8 e5 phou2-thong e5 peng5-iu2, che e5 li2-iu5 chiah bian2-kiong2, goa2 ia7 iu5-goan5 kek-gong7-gong7, li2 na7 beh kah goa2 chhe2, goa2 boe7 koh chai3 lo-so, u7 iann2 bo5 u7 iann2 bo5?
你講無這回事，是我底烏白想，你講伊只是一个普通的朋友，這个理由即勉強，我也猶原激戇戇，你若欲佮我扯，我袂閣再囉唆，有影無有影無？

li2 kong2 bo5 chit hoe5 su7, si7 goa2 teh ou-peh8 siunn7, li2 kong2 i chi2-si7 chit8 e5 phou2-thong e5 peng5-iu2, chit e5 li2-iu5 chiah bian2-kiong2, goa2 ia7 iu5-goan5 kek-gong7-gong7, li2 na7 beh kah goa2 chhe3, goa2 boe7 koh chai3 lo-so, u7 iann2 bo5 u7 iann2 bo5?
三叔公也九嬸婆，真正老風騷，別項舞步無愛學，愛跳阿哥哥。音樂節奏無清楚，腳步踏未和，兩个跳甲花糊糊，抱底玲瓏遨。

sann chek-kong ia7 kau2 chim2-po5, chin-chiann3 lau7-hong-so, pat8-hang7 bu2-pou7 bo5 ai3 oh8, ai3 thiau3 a-ko-ko. im-gak8 chiat-chau3 bo5 chheng-chho2, kha-pou7 tah8 boe7 ho5, nng7 e5 thiau3 kah hoe ko5-ko5, pho7 teh leng5-long5 go5.
三叔公也七十多，頭毛喙鬚白，九嬸婆也腳骨小，今年七十歲。三步進前兩步退，愈跳愈好勢，雖然老骨碇硿硿，未輸少年家。

sann chek-kong ia7 chhit-chap8 to, thau5-mou5 chhui3-chhiu peh8, kau2 chim2-po5 ia7 kha-kut sio2, kin-ni5 chhit-chap8 he3. sann pou7 chin3-cheng5 nng7 pou7 the3, ju2 thiau3 ju2 ho2-se3, sui-jian5 lau7 kut tiann7-khong-khong, be7 su siau3-lian5-ke.
三叔公也真大派，舉著柺仔頭，九嬸婆也穿旗袍，胸坎激落落。跳舞恢復好青春，感情激真厚，透早跳甲日黃昏，紲落半暝夜。

sann chek-kong ia7 chin toa7-phai3, kiah8 tioh8 koai2-a2-thau5, kau2 chim2-po5 ia7 chheng7 ki5-phau5, heng-kham2 kek-loh8-loh8. thiau3-bu2 hoe-hok8 ho2 chheng-chhun, kam2-cheng5 kek chin hou7, thau3-cha2 thiau3 kah jit8 hong5-hun, soa3--loh8 poann3-mi5 ia7.
三叔公啊目睭花，目鏡掛椆椆，九嬸婆也點胭脂，面皮激憔憔。兩个跳甲燒滾滾，快樂又逍遙，目鏡落下煞尋無，無法閣再跳。

sann chek-kong ia7 bak8-chiu hoe, bak8-kiann3 koa3 tiau5-tiau5, kau2 chim2-po5 ia7 tiam2 ian-chi, bin7-phoe5 kek liau5-liau5. nng7 e5 thiau3 kah sio-kun2-kun2, khoai3-lok8 iu7 siau-iau5, bak8-kiann3 lak-he7 soah chhoe7 bo5, bo5 hoat koh chai3 thiau3.
